abstract: NBA Roundup; Dallas Mavericks defeat Brooklyn Nets, 91-79; other pro basketball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Kevin Love scored 29 points as Cleveland rolled to another high-scoring win, 114-106, over the Detroit Pistons.

headline.main: Cavaliers Give New Coach What He Wants: More Offense
headline.print_headline: Williams Struggles Against Nets, but the Mavericks Don’t

snippet: Kevin Love scored 29 points as Cleveland rolled to another high-scoring win, 114-106, over the Detroit Pistons.
